attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many Muslims in the UK feel they require a national holiday to celebrate the Birth of Prophet Muhammad (Peace & Blessings be upon him).

Milad-Un-Nabi is also known as EID to all Muslims.

This is done in many countries, Muslim & Non-Muslim: AFRICAN: Algeria, Benin, Burkina Faso, Cameroon, Egypt, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Gambia, Guinea, Libya, Mali, Mauritania, Morocco, Niger, Nigeria, Senegal, Sierra Leone, Somalia, Sudan, Tanzania, Tunisia, Togo. MID-EAST: Bahrain, Iran, Iraq, Jordan, Kuwait, Lebanon, Oman, Palestine, Syria, United Arab Emirates/UAE, Yemen. ASIA: Afghanistan, Bangladesh, India, Indonesia, Pakistan, Malaysia, Sri Lanka, Uzbekistan.

FUTURE DATES FOR MILAD:
1) Tuesday 15th February 2011
2) Saturday 4th February 2012
3) Thursday 24th February 2013

Petition 1: 407 - Tahseen Khalid (petitions.number10.gov.uk/Mawlid/)
Petition 2: 282 - Ali Javed (petitions.number10.gov.uk/mawlid2/)
Petition 3: 281 - Ali Javed (petitions.number10.gov.uk/milad-e-mustafa/)

From previous petitions we got 970 signatures. For this petiton we need 300 or more to get a holiday.

rejection.details: We require provision of a full address.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
